name: Success/Error Interactive Variant Animated Button
description:
*Note - These buttons only work if you are already included in the interactive variant beta.


Test Prototype 


Success/Error Interactive Variant Animated Button

This is a little project to see if I could use Interactive Variants to create an animated progress bar button.


These variants include:

  • each state of the button
  • Progress bar speed options
  • And the option to show either success or error.


Test Prototype


Enjoy,

Feedback welcomed!
